		document.writeln('<input type="radio" name="Dev2fromServiceDD" id="fromServiceN" value="no" /> No');
	 }else{
	 document.writeln('<input type="radio" name="Dev2fromServiceDD" id="fromServiceY" value="yes" disabled="true" /> Yes');

	 }
</script>
 <script>
	 
	 $(document).ready(function(){
		 
			$('#fromServiceY').click(function(){
				toggleCustomDatabinding(true);
			 });
			$('#fromServiceN').click(function(){
				toggleCustomDatabinding(false);
			});
			
			var isService = false;
			if(s == "yes"){
				isService = true;
			}
			
			toggleCustomDatabinding(isService);
		});
</script>
